products.title: Glazed Donut
products.description: A classic glazed donut with a sweet and shiny sugar coating. Perfectly soft on the inside and delightfully crispy on the outside.

products.title: Chocolate Donut
products.description: Indulge in the rich and decadent flavor of our chocolate donut. Topped with a luscious chocolate glaze and chocolate shavings.

products.title: Strawberry Donut
products.description: Experience the burst of fruity goodness with our strawberry donut. Made with real strawberries and topped with a pink strawberry-flavored glaze.

products.title: Blueberry Donut
products.description: Enjoy the delightful blend of sweet and tangy flavors in our blueberry donut. Decorated with blueberry glaze and a sprinkle of blueberry bits.

products.title: Cinnamon Donut
products.description: Warm up your taste buds with the comforting aroma of our cinnamon donut. Coated with cinnamon sugar and a touch of nutmeg.

products.title: Powdered Sugar Donut
products.description: Delicate and soft, our powdered sugar donut is generously coated with a fine layer of powdered sugar, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

products.title: Sprinkles Donut
products.description: A cheerful treat that's as fun to look at as it is to eat. Our sprinkles donut is covered in colorful sprinkles that add a playful crunch.

products.title: Jelly Donut
products.description: Bite into the surprise of a fruity jelly filling encased in a soft and fluffy donut. Coated with a dusting of powdered sugar.

products.title: Peanut Butter Donut
products.description: Satisfy your cravings with the nutty goodness of our peanut butter donut. Topped with a creamy peanut butter glaze and crushed peanuts.

products.title: Maple Glazed Donut
products.description: Experience the warmth of our maple glazed donut. The sweet maple glaze complements the softness of the donut, creating a harmonious blend of flavors.

products.title: Cream-Filled Donut
products.description: Indulge in the luxurious creaminess of our cream-filled donut. A delicate pastry filled with luscious vanilla cream and dusted with powdered sugar.

products.title: Apple Cider Donut
products.description: Embrace the flavors of fall with our apple cider donut. Infused with apple cider and warming spices, it's a true seasonal delight.

products.title: Sour Cream Donut
products.description: Discover the unique tanginess of our sour cream donut. The sour cream adds a pleasant twist to the classic donut flavor.

products.title: Marble Donut
products.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our marble donut. A swirl of chocolate and vanilla flavors makes this donut a visual and taste delight.

products.title: Coconut Donut
products.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our coconut donut. Topped with shredded coconut, it's a taste of sunshine in every bite.

products.title: Red Velvet Donut
products.description: Indulge in the velvety goodness of our red velvet donut. A rich cocoa-based treat with a hint of tanginess, topped with cream cheese glaze.

products.title: Mint Chocolate Donut
products.description: Refresh your senses with our mint chocolate donut. A perfect balance of cool mint and rich chocolate, topped with chocolate shavings.

products.title: Caramel Glazed Donut
products.description: Experience pure indulgence with our caramel glazed donut. The sweet caramel glaze complements the soft donut, creating a delightful treat.

products.title: Raspberry Donut
products.description: Delight in the vibrant flavors of our raspberry donut. Topped with a tangy raspberry glaze and a sprinkle of freeze-dried raspberries.

products.title: Lemon Donut
products.description: Awaken your taste buds with the zesty goodness of our lemon donut. Topped with a tangy lemon glaze and a sprinkle of lemon zest.
